LanguageData.JE_BiblicallyAccurateJorisEntersLetter: A truly bizarre creature has appeared nearby, heralded by freak blasts of light and a faint sound of trumpets.\n\nIt seems not to be very interested in the colony, and perhaps it would be wise to give it a wide berth.
LanguageData.JE_JorisCargoPodCrash: You have detected a cargo pod crashing nearby. A captive exotic polar bear seems to be inside.\n\nWho knows, but perhaps you'll find something useful in the wreckage. Or love. You may find love.
LanguageData.JE_JorisSpawnMultiplierTooltip: This multiplier will affect the spawn changes (commonalities) of ALL animals in this mod. For example, if set to 0.5 animals from the mod will spawn half as much as default (which is 1). If set to 2, you'll get twice as many as default, and so on. This only affects wild spawns.
